text: How old are you?
Are you 65 years old or older?
What is your current living situation?
options: Living together with family, in a shared flat, or in a supervised community facility

comment: Care services or support that you provide in connection with your professional activity are not meant.
text: At least once a week, do you privately care for people with age-related conditions, chronic illnesses, or frailty?
Do you work in one of the following areas?
options: In a community facility (school, day care center, university, home etc.)
No, in none of the above

text: Do you smoke?
Are you pregnant?

comment:
Close contact with a confirmed case means:
  • Face-to-face contact for longer than 15 minutes
  • Direct, physical contact (touching, shaking hands, kissing)
  • Being within 1.5 meters of the person for more than 15 minutes
  • Contact with or exchange of body fluids
  • Living in the same apartment
Choose "no" if you have worn adequate protective measures (mask, smock) on contact.
text: Have you had close contact with a confirmed case?
What day was the last contact?
Have you had a fever (over 38°C) in the past 24 hours?
Have you had a fever (over 38°C) in the past 4 days?
What was the highest temperature, approx.?
In the past 24 hours, have you had chills?
In the past 24 hours, have you felt tired or worn out?
In the past 24 hours, have you had body aches?

comment:
The question relates to cold symptoms and excludes chronic cough, seasonal or allergy-related cough.
If you have a chronic cough, please compare your current coughing to your regular problems.
text: In the past 24 hours, have you had a persistent cough?

comment: The question relates to cold symptoms and excludes chronic runny nose, seasonal or allergy-related runny nose. If you have chronic sniffling, please compare your current conditions with your existing problems.
text: In the past 24 hours, have you had a runny nose?

comment: If you have a chronic bowel disease, please compare your current bowel symptoms to your bowel patterns under your existing medical condition.
text: In the past 24 hours, have you had diarrhea?
In the past 24 hours, have you had a sore throat?
In the past 24 hours, have you had a headache?

comment:
Check the box if you:
  • Become breathless faster than usual or have difficulty breathing with light loads, such as a walk or climbing a short flight of stairs
  • Experience difficulty breathing or shortness of breath when sitting or lying down
  • Have a feeling of breathlessness/shortness of breath when getting up from bed or a chair
If you have chronic lung disease, compare your current breathing problems with your existing breathing problems.
text: In the past 24 hours, did you feel that you were more quickly out of breath than usual?
Have you had any taste and/or smell loss in the last 24 hours?
With regard to all questions about symptoms: since when have you had the symptoms you specified?
Have you been diagnosed with chronic lung disease by a doctor?
Have you been diagnosed with diabetes by a doctor?
Have you been diagnosed with heart disease by a doctor?
Have you been diagnosed with adipositas (obesity) by a doctor?
Are you currently taking steroids?

comment: You take or get immunosuppresives after an organ transplant, in the therapy of an autoimmune disease, or during chemotherapy.
text: Are you currently taking immunosuppressants?
Have you been vaccinated against flu between October 2019 and today?
